Package com.topcoder.util.datavalidator

Interface Summary
ObjectValidator This is the main contract for object validation.
 

Class Summary
AbstractAssociativeObjectValidator This is an abstract class that is used to abstract functionality of validator composition.
AbstractObjectValidator This is an abstract ObjectValidator implementation which gives the ability for resource bundled message fetching for the validation messages.
AndValidator This is a specific type of a composite validator which validates based on a boolean AND outcome of all the associated validators.
BooleanValidator This is a simple boolean validator abstraction which basically checks that a given boolean value conforms with the state of this validator.
BundleInfo This is a simple bean which represents the resource bundle information for validators.
ByteValidator This is a simple byte validator abstraction which basically checks that a given value conforms with a specific byte definition.
CharacterValidator This is a simple character validator abstraction which basically checks that a given value conforms with a specific character definition.
DoubleValidator This is a simple double validator abstraction which basically checks that a given value conforms with a specific double definition.
FloatValidator This is a simple float validator abstraction which basically checks that a given value conforms with a specific float definition.
IntegerValidator This is a simple integer validator abstraction which basically checks that a given value conforms with a specific integer definition.
LongValidator This is a simple long integer validator abstraction which basically checks that a given value conforms with a specific long integer definition.
NotValidator This is a specific type of a composite validator which validates based on a boolean NOT outcome of the associated validator.
NullValidator This is a specific type of a simple validator which validates based on a boolean whether the input object is null or not.
OrValidator This is a specific type of a composite validator which validates based on a boolean OR outcome of all the associated validators.
PrimitiveValidator This is a specific wrapper for all validators that deal with primitive type value validation such a Integer, Boolean, Long, Double, Float, Byte, or Short this is nothing more than a convenience wrapper.
ShortValidator This is a simple short integer validator abstraction which basically checks that a given value conforms with a specific short integer definition.
StringValidator This is a simple String validator abstraction which basically checks that a given value conforms with a specific string definition.
TypeValidator This is a simple ObjectValidator which specifically deals with validating the input type of a value.
